tool.name: OGS: FEFLOW2OGS
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'FEFLOW2OGS'.
tool.command: for i in $in; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; FEFLOW2OGS --in '$in.element_identifier' --out output_1.if extension is msh, old ogs file format is written

data.name: output_FEFLOW2OGS
data.label: Output file from FEFLOW2OGS
data.from_work_dir: output_1.if extension is msh, old ogs file format is written

tool.help: This tool runs the **FEFLOW2OGS** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
